overview: Selena Rose and her stepbrother have devious plans to screw the system and get back at the social worker assigned to watch over Selena while she's on probation. She was a naughty girl in and out of Juvenile Hall who wants to "go straight'. Under the influence of her criminal stepbrother, she remains a ward of a broken system where sex is used as manipulation. She has learned that sex is a powerful tool for getting your way, and readies to seek her revenge.
tagline: He'll get her in the end
title: Sex and Corruption
